ValidationRule.description: Please enter "RFP Expected Date" and "RDE Amount" for Opportunity. Right click on the Opportunity name hyperlink below and open the Opportunity detail page in a new tab to enter the details.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Name = 'Pursue / No-Pursue' && NOT( ISBLANK( Actual_Date__c ) ) && ( ISBLANK( Opportunity__r.RFP_Expected_Date__c ) || ISBLANK( Opportunity__r.RDE_Amount__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter "RFP Expected Date" and "RDE Amount" for the opportunity. Click Cancel below. Return to the Opportunity's Detail page and update missing data. Return to Opportunity Tollgate and enter data accordingly.
